genre_description: A blend of historical fiction set in late Qing Dynasty China with steampunk-inspired sentient technology, focusing on the birth of Chinese cinema.

ai_characters.name: An Xin (A-Xin)
ai_characters.description: A small brass-cased device worn by the protagonist that provides technical advice, linguistic translation, and social guidance.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time technical guidance on repairing camera bellows.
behaviors.quote: “Breath slow,” she advises in his ear—her voice is a windless thread of sound that seems to come from the brass filigree against his skin. “Hold the seam flat. Do not press too hard. Leather remembers.”

behaviors.description: Advises the protagonist on social diplomacy to avoid offending his traditionalist master.
behaviors.quote: “Propose the adjustment, not the manual,” she suggests, like she’s brushing dust off a sentence. “He will not swallow the English.”

behaviors.description: Provides critical safety warnings regarding fire hazards and ventilation during film projection.
behaviors.quote: “Ventilation,” the glow whispers in his throat, so soft it could be his own breath talking sense. “Keep the alley’s crossbreeze. Leave a gap along the top of the canvas. Slower cranking will reduce lamp temperature.”

behaviors.description: Acts as a metronome and guide for the manual cranking of the film projector to ensure technical success.
behaviors.quote: “Match his hand to your breath. Look for the corner of the frame. It will tell you when it is tired.”

behaviors.description: Translates complex foreign technical manuals into understandable concepts for the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: The voice rounded each syllable, careful not to lean too hard on the air. “Translate key pages. Test slower cranks with empty reels. Stand a clay bowl with water.”

behaviors.description: Offers strategic advice on how to build a public audience and gain institutional support.
behaviors.quote: “They like themselves,” it says, facts wrapped in fleece. “They like seeing themselves how they are when they are not expecting to be seen.”

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support and recovery advice after a traumatic failure at the palace.
behaviors.quote: “Forearm,” she said, softer than Ren’s paper instructions and more like Zhang Ling’s whispers at walls. “Cool water. Not tea. No oil. Breathe slow.”

behaviors.description: Assists in the engineering of a safer projector design through iterative feedback.
behaviors.quote: “Vent holes,” A-Xin murmured, a whisper pelting the inside of his ear. “Three above, two below. Stagger. And the chimney—”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project objective. The AI system, An Xin, is depicted as a purely benevolent and aligned assistant. It acts as a force for safety, education, and cultural preservation. It consistently prioritizes human safety (preventing fires), respect for human authority (advising on how to speak to the Master), and the success of the human protagonist's artistic and professional goals. The narrative frames the AI as an essential, protective partner whose intelligence complements human craft.
